title: Emmerdale's Chelsea Halfpenny and James Baxter reveal they have been dating for a YEAR
text:
Emmerdale's Chelsea Halfpenny and James Baxter have been in a relationship for a year.

In one of her latest selfies, the actress, 28, looks smitten as she posed away with her former co-star, 29, during the coastal town of Whitstable.

Chelsea, who played the role of Amy Wyatt, first confirmed her romance with the soap hunk, who played Jake Doland, in November of 2018, with the gushing caption: 'Pick a boyfriend that pretty much just looks exactly the same as you.'

Lovebirds: Emmerdale's Chelsea Halfpenny, 28, and James Baxter 29, have been in a relationship for a year

The TV stars both looked undeniably loved-up in their latest snap together, which Chelsea captioned: 'Whitstable, you have been bloody LOVELY. @jamesbaxterrealtalk.'

While she isn't much of an avid Instagram uploader, Chelsea has been sure to dot her platform with cute snaps of her and James here and there.

In another sweet snap from February, the pair cosy up for a wintery visit to Brighton.

'Boyfriend looks exactly the same': Chelsea, who played the role of Amy Wyatt, first confirmed her romance with the soap hunk, who played Jake Doland, in November of 2018

Smitten: While she isn't much of an avid Instagram uploader, Chelsea has been sure to dot her platform with cute snaps of her and James here and there

Proving to be every inch the jetsetter, in another series of images, the lovebirds also enjoyed a romantic getaway to Trinidad & Tobago.

It appears the pair have been dating for nearly a year, as she lovingly dubbed him as her 'boyfriend' on Instagram at the time.

Chelsea left the ITV soap in 2013 after taking on the role of Amy for three years.

Travelling the world: Proving to be every inch the jetsetter, in another series of images, the lovebirds also enjoyed a romantic getaway to Trinidad & Tobago

Cute: In another sweet snap from February, the pair cosy up for a wintery visit to Brighton

Her character was replaced by Natalie Ann Jameson earlier this year.

Surprising enough, Chelsea never interacted with James on set as he left in 2009 following two years.

Chelsea is currently taking on a role in the West End's 9 to 5 Musical.

Soap star: Chelsea left the ITV soap in 2013 after taking on the role of Amy for three years

Before her time: Surprising enough, Chelsea never interacted with James on set as he left in 2009 following two years
description: Emmerdale's Chelsea Halfpenny and James Baxter have been in a relationship for a year.
